By Omni Strunks on Tuesday, August 19, 2003 - 07:26 am:

Metalner subs give way too much guts regen, a good lifestage, any /metalner has a 3 in skill or above (Great for Astro..), and decent lifespan. It makes monsters like Gidras, Astro, Metal Shell, Metal Glory, Metal Glay, yeah, pretty much every /metalner is great.

HR didn't want /metalners in because of the many advantages they have on other subs. But anyway, this is where I remember losing to Lisa and quote revenge someday. I still got 2nd though..
